data.title: New York Area Codes
data.meta_description: Find New York area codes by city or lookup which cities belong to an area code.
data.text:
Area Codes in New York - Below are all the area codes in New York. Clicking on an area code will show the cities in that area code.

212315332347516518585607631646680716718838845914917929934

Area Code Search

Find area codes fast with the Area Code Search. Enter a city and state in the search box below to find all the area codes in that city.

Find cities fast with the Area Code Search. Enter an area code into the search box below to find all the cities in that area code.
